page.title: 12ATTITUDES
page.content: Farmers undecided about advantage of EEC consider it to involve excessive paper work. High price of land means static family farms only. Speed & volume of traffic on new main road causes problems when driving animals. Longing for older simpler days of farming. Villagers dislike low flying military aircraft & presence of nuclear bunker at Blaenplwyf Uchaf. Religious hold on older villagers is strong. No wish to cater for English speaking Christians who must go else- where. Since closure of slate mines & school village life less lively. Sometimes lack of communication about village events. No pub wanted. Little organised for young people or children.Excessive street lighting in village. Car rallies are of little interest to villagers, leave rubbish, are noisy & dangerous through village.
